---
title: "Lab 5"
output: html_notebook
---

Load Data

```{r}
auMap <- readOGR(dsn="IV-lab-5-data-new/SpatialData/AusStates.shp")
```

```{r}
class(auMap)
```

Plot Map with rgdal

```{r}
plot(auMap)
```

Map Conversion

```{r}
auMapDf <- fortify(auMap)
```

Plot Map

```{r}
ggplot(auMapDf) + aes(long, lat, group=group) + geom_polygon()
```
